**Explanation**: standard type which can be used to easily define line parameters with the pandapower standard type library
Index of bus where the line starts
Index of bus where the line ends
resistance of the line [Ohm per km]
inductance of the line [Ohm per km]
capacitance of the line [nF per km]

**Value Range**:
| Naming conventions:

| *"ol"* - overhead line 
| *"cs"* - underground cable system

**Explanation**: specifies if the line is in service. Only in service elements are considered during loadflow calculation
